summary: This is a little modification of Succubus By Hentai -CBBE3 Gift By Nausicaa Mod, added a cloth version and the chance to craft all kinds of cuirass with \"archmage robe\" enchantment.
descriptionHtml:
Hi =D

This is a little modification of Succubus By Hentai -CBBE3 Gift By Nausicaa Mod, you can find the original one in this page:

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15156//?

DESCRIPTION:

1) I added the chance to craft A full cloth version to be used by Mages, all craftable pieces can be found in Hide section and need no perk.

2) Now to craft Daedric and Dragonscales models need the appropriate perks <.<

3) A Succubus Archmage? Of course!!! XD
If you have the \\\"Archmage Robe\\\" on you inventory, you can craft a Succubus\\\'s Archmage Robe for all kind of models. For cloth and leather need no perks, but for daedric and dragonscales one need appropriate perks. This modification does not change the original Archmage Robe but create a new one. All new archmage models are not disenchantable at arcane table, but you can temper all armor models.


REQUIREMENT:
only Skyrim.

IMPORTANT NOTE:
This is not an addon mod. You can use my esp file, or Nausicaa original one, but no all two in the same time.

INSTALL: 
Overwrite the Data Folder.
Turn on SuccubusCBBE3GiftByNausicaa&Cybertron.esp in the esp mod list.

UNINSTALL:
Before unistall be sure that no characters wear the \\\"Succubus Archmage Robe\\\" in any model. There is a chance that your characters have a permanent affect as they wear the Archmage Robe.

Delete the folder: Data/Meshes/Nausicaa/Hentai/Succubus
Delete the folder: Data/Textures/armor/Hentai/Su
Delete the File: Data/SuccubusCBBE3GiftByNausicaa&Cybertron77.esp
Delete the File: Data/SuccubusCBBE3GiftByNausicaa&Cybertron.txt

CREDITS:
Hentai gets credit for Mesh & texture.
Popjjg gets credit for texture. (violet stocking)
Nausicaa gets credit for convertion
	 
OPTIONAL FILE: DRAGONPRIEST\'S HORN MASKS

This is an addon of SuccubusCBBE3GiftByNausicaa-Cybertron77 Mod. It works independently by main file so you can play all in the same time or play only this addon.

You want use DragonPriest\'s Masks but it\'s a bit frustrating see your Succubus wearing an ugly mask with a wrong kind of armor. :|
So, I solved the problem, your Succubus can now wear all kind of Dragonpriest\'s Masks with appearence of horns and choose the right kind of armor. xD 


DESCRIPTION:

There are 9 DragoPriest\'s Masks in the game, for each one there is this chance:
if you have a dragonpriest\'s mask on your inventory u can craft at forge 3 versions of the same mask, cloth, light and heavy with the apperance of Succubus\'s horns.

All models are in Daedric Crafting List, they look like circlets and you need no perk to craft \'em. 

The armor rating is the same of the original models, 21 for light and 23 for heavy. 

This mod does not change original models, all craftable models are new.

All models can not be unenchanted to learn the enchantments.

You can temper all light and heavy models but you need arcane blacksmith perk. If you want a better armor you need Daedric perk too.

Crafting List: 
cloth, light and heavy model need the same ingretients:

Hevnoraak: 3 Iron Ingots + 2 Silver Ingots. Tempering: 1 Iron Ingot
Konahrik: 5 Gold Ingots. Tempering: 1 Gold Ingot
Krosis: 3 Iron Ingots + 2 Gold Ingots. Tempering: 1 Iron Ingot
Morokei: 3 Moonstones + 3 Silver Ingots. Tempering: 1 Moonstone
Nahriin: 3 Ebony Ingots + 2 Silver Ingots. Tempering: 1 Ebony Ingot
Otar: 3 Malachite + 2 Gold Ingots. Tempering: 1 Malachite
Rahgot: 3 Orichalcum ingots + 2 Silver Ingots. Tempering: 1 Orichalcum Ingot
Vokun: 3 Steel Ingots + 2 Silver Ingots. Tempering: 1 Steel Ingot
Volsung: 3 Corundum Ingots + 2 Silver Ingots. Tempering: 1 Corundum Ingots

REQUIREMENTS:
only Skyrim :)

INSTALLATION:
overwrite Data Folder
Turn on \"SuccubusCBBE3GiftByNausicaa&CybertronDPMasksAddon.esp\" in the mod list.

UNINSTALLATION:
Before uninstall, unequip all dragonpriest horns by your characters and save.

Delete the file \"SuccubusCBBE3GiftByNausicaa&CybertronDPMasksAddon.esp\" in the Data folder.

If you are not using the main version of this mod delete also these folders:
Data/Meshes/Nausicaa/Hentai/Succubus
Data/Textures/armor/Hentai/Su 

NOTE:
You can find the original version of this mod (Circlets) in this page: 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/39986//?

If you appreciates my work please ENDORSE!! :)

HAVE FUN!!!
author: Cybertron77

files.name: ADDON DragonPriest Masks  Horns cloth light and heavy version
